introduction: DEAR MOM traces the story of Song, a 11-year-old Hmong girl who for the past six years has been trying to come to terms with the absence of her mother while growing up in the mountains of northwestern Vietnam.In the form of a letter written by Song herself, the film offers a (hopefully initial) look at the emotional travails as well as social challenges that children struck by such unfortunate circumstances have to endure and yet somehow still try to overcome.
